name: para_and_coder_setup
author: https://github.com/ChristianHaake
title: PARA and CODER Setup
description: The PARA concept, which divides information into the categories of Projects, Areas, Resources, and Archives, provides a structuring level that organizes processes and knowledge in a clear and comprehensible manner. For a detailed explanation, check the article: https://haak3.de/articles/2023_Anytype/2023_Anytype-mit-PARA/2023_Using-PARA-with-Anytype-EN.html
